io.proximax.dfms.cid

Class CidV1

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.proximax.dfms.cid.CidV1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cid

    public class CidV1
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cid
    Cid version 1 introduces header in-front of multihash. This header identifies multihash version and codec - each as an unsigned byte
